full_text: Pipe) Bene Bie awe 4 2014/KER/202 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA ATERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR.JUSTICE HARUN-UL-RASHID THURSDAY, THE 2ND DAY OF JANUARY 2014/12TH POUSHA, 1935 Crl.MC.No. 6 of 2014 0 ST 1136/2008 of JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-I MUVATUPUZHA PETITIONER/ACCUSED : BINDU RAJAN, AGED 38 YEARS W/O.RAJAN, KUTTAKKALLIL HOUSE CHATTUPARA MACHIPLAVUP O ADIMALY, DUKKI-685561 BY ADV.SRIP.B.AJOY RESPONDENTS/STATE & COMPLAINANT : 1. STATE OF KERALA REP BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA ERNAKULAM 2. JAYANR, S/O.LATE RAMAN PILLAI GAYEE NIVAS, HOUSE NO.36 HOUSING BOARD MUVATTUPUZHA BRANCH MANAGER AND POWER OF ATTORNEY HOLDER MUTHOOT LEASING AND FINANCE LIMITED SALAL TOWERS(MAKKAR PLAZA), BYE PASS ROAD PNB JUNCTION, MOUVATTUPUZHA, ERNAKUALM-686673 R BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SMT.S.HYMA THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 02-01-2014, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: bree Bene Bie awe 4 2014/KER/202 CrLMC.No. 6 of 2014 () APPENDIX PETITIONER(S)' EXHIBITS ANNEX.1:-TRUE COPY OF THE ORDER SHEET IN ST NO 1136/2008 PENDING BEFORE THE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT I, MUVATTUPUZHA RESPONDENT(S)' EXHIBITS : NIL /TRUE COPY/ PATO JUDGE AV 2014/KER/202 HARUN-UL-RASHID, J. Dated this the 2 day of January, 2014 ORDER Petitioner is the accused in S.T.No.1136/2008 on the file of Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-l, Muvattupuzha. The offence alleged is punishable under Section 138 of the Negotiable Instruments Act. The petitioner failed to appear before court on 31/01/2013, the court issued non-bailable warrant and steps are initiated under Section 82-83 on the same day. The offence alleged under Section 138 of the Negotiable Instruments Act is a bailable offence. 3. The petitioner is willing to surrender before the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-l, Muvattupuzha. Non-bailable warrant is pending against her. Now, the petitioner seeks a direction from this Court to consider her application for bail on the date of surrender itself. In the facts and circumstances, the Crl.M.C is disposed of, directing the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-l, Muvattupuzha to consider and pass orders on the bail application on the date of surrender itself in the event of the petitioner surrendering before the court below and submitting an application for bail with prior notice to the Assistant Public bere Bae 2014/KER/202 Crl.M.C.No. 6 of 2014 2 Prosecutor within a period of three weeks from today. Non- bailable warrant issued shall be kept in abeyance till the disposal of the bail application. Sd/- HARUN-UL-RASHID, JUDGE. AV
